options.query:
index=main sourcetype="splunk-ddss-exploration-toolkit"
| stats count by splunkBucketIndex
| fields splunkBucketIndex

index=$dd_h2u5fyI4$ sourcetype=splunk-ddss-exploration-toolkit splunkBucketIndex=$dd_Hoh6K8aB$
| dedup splunkBucketPath
| eval earliestBucketTime = strptime("$tr_JaulZ8Sa.earliest$","%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%NZ")
| eval latestBucketTime = strptime("$tr_JaulZ8Sa.latest$","%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%NZ")
| eval earliestEventTime = if(isnum('earliestEventTime'), 'earliestEventTime', relative_time(now(),"2022-08-01T00:00:00.000Z"))
| eval latestEventTime = if(isnum('latestEventTime'), 'latestEventTime', relative_time(now(),"2022-08-21T00:00:00.000Z"))
| eval currentTime =  relative_time(now(), "-0")
| eval latestEventTime = if(isnull('latestEventTime'), 'currentTime', 'latestEventTime')
| eval earliestEventTime = if(isnull('earliestEventTime'), 0, 'earliestEventTime')
| where earliestEventTime<splunkBucketEarliestTimestampEpoch AND earliestEventTime<splunkBucketLatestTimestampEpoch AND latestEventTime>splunkBucketLatestTimestampEpoch
| table splunkBucketIndex, splunkBucketEarliestTimestamp, splunkBucketLatestTimestamp, s3BucketName, splunkBucketPath
| sort splunkBucketEarliestTimestamp

input_global_trp.title: Time Range: Object In DDSS Storage

input_u2QZaoNg.title: Time Range: Splunk Bucket Earliest and Latest Times
